channel.description: Creating a Dictionary dict_1 = {} dict_2 = {"a": 1, "b": 2, "c": 3} Creating a Dictionary dict_3 = { "cat": "mammal", "lizard": "reptile", "goldfish": "fish", "chickadee": "bird" } Adding to a Dictionary dict_1 = {} dict_1["Kansas"] = "Topeka" dict_1["Nebraska"] = "Lincoln" dict_1["Missouri"] = "Jefferson City" Accessing Dictionary Items dict_3 = { "cat": "mammal", "lizard": "reptile", "goldfish": "fish", "chickadee": "bird" } print(dict_3["cat"]) # mammal Updating Dictionary Items dict_3 = { "
